summary: Returning home from prison, a Vietnam War veteran sets out to clean up his hometown which has come under the control of a violent motorcycle gang.
cast: Gary Busey|Yaphet Kotto|Seymour Cassel|Bert Remsen|Denise Galik|William Smith|Kimberlin Brown|Judith Barsi|Eric Boles|Joe Brooks|Douglas Dirkson|Kathryn Fuller|Jorge Gil|Amelia Haas|Ray Habercorn|Cooper Huckabee|Ted Markland|Brigitte Muller|Thomas Rosales Jr.|James Staszkiel|Timothy Scott|Nicholas Testa|Michael Sinclair Walter|Daniel Cameron
title: El ojo del tigre
